div.p: P = codex Patanimis (Scaff. X, N. 191) saec. XIII.
C = codex Colbertinua (Parisiacus lat. 2709) saec. VIIII.
N = codex Nostradamensia (Parisiacus lat. 17385) eaec. VIIII.
F = codex FrisingenaisFrisingensis 112 (Monac. lat. 6312) saec. VIIII.
G = codex Gandauensis 95 saec. X ex.
A = codex Augienaia IX saec. VIIII in.
B t* codex Bruxellensis 1049 (II 972) eaec. VIIII-X.
X = consensus codicum FGAB uel omnium uel plurimorum.
